name: Super Sperm
description:
Lois Lane and Superman looked for a doctor to recommend the best contraceptive for birth control, Doctor said: Kryptonite t is the best Intrauterine Device.

But Super Sperm can avoid all the kryptonite till the end.
Very Small Game
Use Space to start and Push Up the Super Sperm
Press R to restart Level and rearrange the obstacles on your way.
This used to be a .EXE game so ignore the indications of F1: Info, and window size it dont work on web version

Another old game this one is from 2012
